content.title: Intro
content.content:
1999
Preceded by
1999
2000
Year
2001
Followed by
2001
You may also be looking for Third Age 2000.

Tolkien-related events that took place in 2000.

content.title: January
content.content:
1 - Actor Leon Wadham is born.
30 - Tolkien's Legendarium is published.
30 - Actress Markella Kavenagh is born.
? - Amon Hen 161 is published.
? - Other Hands 28 is published.

content.title: March
content.content:
19 - Actor Fraser Kerr dies.
29 - Tyalie Tyelellieva issue 14 is published.

content.title: June
content.content: 28 - The Tolkien Ensemble publish their second album, A Night in Rivendell.

content.title: July
content.content:
20 - The second Tolkien Thing is held.
? - Vinyar Tengwar 41 is published.
? - Other Hands 29/30 is published.

content.title: September
content.content:
5 - Tyalie Tyelellieva issue 15 is published.
22-24 - Oxonmoot 2000.
30 - J.R.R. Tolkien and His Literary Resonances is published.
? - The End of the Third Age is published.
? - J.R.R. Tolkien: Author of the Century is published.

content.title: November
content.content:
6 - Author L. Sprague de Camp dies.
23 - Rayner Unwin, the first reader of The Hobbit, dies.

content.title: December
content.content:
22 - Principal photography for The Lord of the Rings (film series) ends.
23 - Actor Billy Barty dies.
26 - Actor Michael Deacon dies.
26 - Composer Paul Kont dies.

? - Lord of the Rings (board game) is released.
? - The first trailer The Lord of the Rings film series is released online.
Years
1997 1998 1999 2000 2001 2002 2003
